title: Navigate forwards to a slider
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the Red slider
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Red' slider.

title: Navigate backwards to a slider
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the Red slider
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Red' slider.

title: Request information about a slider
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, read information about the slider.

title: Increment a slider by one step
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 129.

title: Decrement a slider by one step
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 127.

title: Increment a slider by ten steps
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 138.

title: Decrement a slider by ten steps
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 118.

title: Decrement a slider to the minimum value
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 0.

title: Increment a slider to the maximum value
instructions: With focus on the 'Red' slider, set its value to 255.
